医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
2021-22 年，澳大利亚 53% 的受伤住院病例是由普通家养宠物造成的猫和狗是澳大利亚最常见的家养宠物，2021-22 年与动物接触相关的所有受伤住院治疗中，有一半以上 (53%) 是由猫和狗造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Common-domestic-pets-in-Australia-responsible-for-5325-of-injury-hospitalizations-in-2021e2809322.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Common-domestic-pets-in-Australia-responsible-for-5325-of-injury-hospitalizations-in-2021e2809322.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=496e5657-d842-473a-9b15-e1beab1ec180 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 06:09:00 -0400 Common domestic pets in Australia responsible for 53% of injury hospitalizations in 2021–22
试管受精解决方案有助于解决英国人口老龄化导致的出生率下降问题试管受精解决方案有助于解决英国人口老龄化导致的出生率下降问题https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/IVF-solutions-could-help-address-the-falling-birth-rates-among-UKs-aging-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/IVF-solutions-could-help-address-the-falling-birth-rates-among-UKs-aging-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1257a434-4feb-41af-ad6a-4c6ae34a4204 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 06:04:00 -0400 IVF solutions could help address the falling birth rates among UK's aging population
研究人员旨在创建人工智能驱动的模型来早期检测肺癌风险https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Researchers-aim-to-create-AI-driven-model-for-early-detection-of-lung-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Researchers-aim-to-create-AI-driven-model-for-early-detection-of-lung-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf6ced5a-0da9-4da8-bc5e-d4f73bb4306b Mon, 18 Mar 2024 06:02:00 -0400 Researchers aim to create AI-driven model for early detection of lung cancer risk
痛风不仅是维多利亚人的专利：四分之一的英国人患有这种极其痛苦的疾病​​​​​​​如果您认为痛风是一种过时的疾病，影响肥胖、红脸的维多利亚时代人，那么请再想一想。现在，四分之一的英国人患有这种极其痛苦的疾病，使其成为英国最常见的炎症性关节炎。一位权威专家表示，20 多岁和 30 多岁人群的病例增加了 30%，需要更快的监测和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Gout-not-just-for-Victorians-1-in-40-Brits-have-this-extremely-painful-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Gout-not-just-for-Victorians-1-in-40-Brits-have-this-extremely-painful-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b88abf-6934-4dbc-b4fe-7e153ee19d4a Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:57:00 -0400 Gout not just for Victorians: 1 in 40 Brits have this extremely painful disease
Viroclinics-DDL 更名为 Cerba Research Viroclinics-DDL（以下简称荷兰 Cerba Research）是一家世界领先的疫苗和抗病毒专业实验室，提供植根于病毒学的研究和临床试验解决方案，自豪地宣布自 2024 年 4 月 1 日起更名为 Cerba Research。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Viroclinics-DDL-rebrands-to-Cerba-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Viroclinics-DDL-rebrands-to-Cerba-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9948c2d-cbd6-4395-9247-ae2106bee0a1 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:47:00 -0400 Viroclinics-DDL rebrands to Cerba Research
绘制微生物群图谱：Abidemi Junaid 博士探讨突破性的阴道芯片维斯研究所对阿比德米的采访。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Mapping-the-Microbiome-Dr-Abidemi-Junaid-on-the-Groundwriting-Vagina-Chip.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Mapping-the-Microbiome-Dr-Abidemi-Junaid-on-the-Groundwriting-Vagina-Chip.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30576abe-ff12-4887-a225-6c0865679522 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:40:00 -0400 Mapping the Microbiome: Dr. Abidemi Junaid on the Groundbreaking Vagina Chip
CryoLogyx 完成 50 万英镑种子轮融资CryoLogyx 是华威大学的一家衍生公司，通过冷冻保存重新定义细胞技术，今天宣布结束其超额认购的种子轮融资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/CryoLogyx-completes-c2a3500k-seed-funding-round.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/CryoLogyx-completes-c2a3500k-seed-funding-round.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc146e80-d25e-487b-af21-fcf4db276d46 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:30:00 -0400 CryoLogyx completes £500k seed funding round
深入探讨罕见的性高潮后疾病综合症全面综述综合了目前对性高潮后疾病综合症（POIS）的了解，这是一种以射精后一系列症状为特征的罕见疾病，强调需要进一步研究以了解其原因并开发有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Rare-condition-post-orgasmic-illness-syndrome-explored-in-deep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Rare-condition-post-orgasmic-illness-syndrome-explored-in-depth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea84a226-d144-4441-b9c4-f424cf68c1bc Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:01:00 -0400 Rare condition post-orgasmic illness syndrome explored in depth
补充维生素 D 对高血压患者骨骼和心脏健康的益处有限研究评估了补充维生素 D 对高血压患者骨骼健康和心血管危险因素的影响，发现除了 PTH 水平外没有显着改善，凸显了维生素 D 代谢的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Vitamin-D-supplementation-shows-limited-benefits-for-bone-and-heart-health-in-hypertential-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Vitamin-D-supplementation-shows-limited-benefits-for-bone-and-heart-health-in-hypertential-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54de582e-1bdc-4d28-98ad-937cf831380f Sun, 17 Mar 2024 22:21:00 -0400 Vitamin D supplementation shows limited benefits for bone and heart health in hypertensive patients
伊利诺伊州麻疹疫情凸显了疫苗接种的迫切需要研究报告称，伊利诺伊州五名未接种疫苗的儿童爆发了麻疹疫情，突显了该疾病即使在没有直接接触的儿童中也具有很高的传播性，这凸显了疫苗接种的至关重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Measles-outbreak-in-Illinois-underscores-ritic-need-for-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240317/Measles-outbreak-in-Illinois-underscores-ritic-need-for-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cb22684-3290-492e-a879-f922e5c40d68 Sun, 17 Mar 2024 22:01:00 -0400 Measles outbreak in Illinois underscores critical need for vaccination
